record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Read External Record command panel" and format.name="read" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: Read External Record command panel - read - en
record.format.name: read

brief.brief: The Read External Record command panel reads a record from a communication session.

detail.detail: File: (file variable) Specify the connection variable associated with the communication session.
Record: (character) Specify the variable to hold the results.
Options: (array of characters) Specify the connecting type specific options.
Exits: (array of labels) Specify the connecting type specific exits.
This panel does not read Service Manager internal files.
Before you can use the read panel in an application, you must use the connect panel to establish a communication session.
